choose.when: select a.no, a.title, a.contents, a.hit, date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') as regDate, a.g_no, a.o_no, a.depth, a.user_no, b.name from board a, user b where a.user_no = b.no order by g_no desc, o_no asc limit #{_parameter.currentPage}, #{_parameter.pageCount}
choose.otherwise: select a.no, a.title, a.contents, a.hit, date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') as regDate, a.g_no, a.o_no, a.depth, a.user_no, b.name from board a, user b where (a.user_no = b.no and a.title like #{_parameter.keyWord}) or (a.user_no = b.no and a.contents like #{_parameter.keyWord}) order by g_no desc, o_no asc limit #{_parameter.currentPage}, #{_parameter.pageCount}

choose.when: insert into board values(null, #{_parameter.title}, #{_parameter.contents}, 1, now(), (select IF(ISNULL(g_no), 1, MAX(g_no) +1) from board t), 1, 1, #{_parameter.user_no})
